GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/topics/:topic.description: serves an object of a specified topic

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an object containing an article by id

article.title: Eight pug gifs that remind me of mitch
article.author: icellusedkars

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of all comments for a particular article

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves a comment object containing the details of the comment

comment.body: what do you call a man without a spade on his head?

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an updated articles object with it's corresponding properties

comment.title: Eight pug gifs that remind me of mitch

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.exampleResponse: this does not send a response body

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of user objects

GET /api/users/:username.description: serves a user object picked by username

PATCH /api/comments/:comment_id.description: serves a comment with an updated vote property
